dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4702 IH: Space Protection Strategy Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Select Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To extend until 2030 the time period required to be covered by the United States Space Protection Strategy.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Space Protection Strategy Extension Act.

section.header: Extension of time period to be covered by the space protection strategy
section.text: Section 911(d) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008 (10 U.S.C. 2271 note) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
